https://openminds.om-i.org/props/behavio._instruction: Add all behavioral protocols that were performed during this session.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/behavio.label: Behavioral protocol
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/behavio.name: behavioralProtocol

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/contras._instruction: Add the contrast agent used for this scan.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/contras.label: Contrast agent
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/contras.name: contrastAgent

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/delayAf._instruction: Enter the duration from trigger delivery to scan onset (only the first volume).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/delayAf.label: Delay after trigger
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/delayAf.name: delayAfterTrigger

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/delayTi._instruction: Enter the arbitrary delay time set by user before each volume acquisition.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/delayTi.label: Delay time
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/delayTi.name: delayTime

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device._instruction: Add the MRI machine setting used for this scan.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.description: Piece of equipment or mechanism (hardware) designed to serve a special purpose or perform a special function.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.label: Device
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.name: device

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fieldMa._instruction: Add the images or field maps used for correction of inhomogeneities in B0 field of this acquisition.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fieldMa.label: Field map
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fieldMa.name: fieldMap

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input._instruction: Add the state of the subject or tissue sample before this session.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input.description: Something or someone that is put into or participates in a process or machine.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input.label: Input
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input.name: input

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO._instruction: Enter number of volumes discarded by user before the first volume.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO.label: Number of volumes discarded by user
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/numberO.name: numberOfVolumesDiscardedByUser

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sbref._instruction: Add the single-band reference image for this volume.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sbref.label: Sbref
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sbref.name: sbref

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specime._instruction: Add the anatomical orientation of the specimen in the scanner.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specime.label: Specimen orientation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specime.name: specimenOrientation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/structu._instruction: Add the structural MRI relevant for this acquisition.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/structu.label: Structural mri
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/structu.name: structuralMRI

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/volumeT._instruction: Enter acquisition times of each vloume.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/volumeT.label: Volume timing
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/volumeT.name: volumeTiming
